import react from 'react'; import {FontAwesomeIcon} from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import {faHtml5, faJava, faPython} from "@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons"; import {faFilm, faImage} from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; const About = () => { let icoSize = "3x" return (

About me

Hi there, My name is Winston and welcome to my website.
I am a native Berliner and currently studying International Media and Computer Science (IMI) at the University of Applied Sciences Berlin (HTW). The major covers all core aspects of computer science and goes also deep into subjects like computer-graphics, web-developement, image manipulation as well as 3D-design (modelling and texturing in Maya) I am a creative, collaborative film-maker who does not shy away from challenging tasks. I am eager to grow my knowledge and enhance skills. Follow me on my journey as I try to unite my two passions, programming and film-making.

Tech Stack

  • HTML, CSS, JS

  • JAVA

  • C#

  • Python

  • DaVinci Resolve

  • Photoshop Lightroom

Languages

  • - Native
  • English - Fluent
  • Spanish - A2
) } export default About;
